mapper.insert: insert into semester (semester_id, name, start_time, end_time) values (#{semesterId}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{endTime});
insert into current_semester(id, semester_id) values (1, #{semesterId}) on duplicate key update semester_id = values(semester_id)
mapper.select: select id, semester_id, name, start_time, end_time, status from semester;
